title: Champions in League of Legends
body:
Can you name all the champions that use Daggers in League of Legends?
Example: Katarina,....

replies.body:
If you mean daggers as perforating weapons smaller than shortswords, then i guess only Shaco and Talon ( latter as a throwing weapon for the update) .

Katarina also it is said to use daggers, but they do look like a mix between a shortsword and a dagger. Most probably tho they are more than classifiable as dagger due to their size and that they can be used as perforating weapon, the fact that they have quite a cutting edge might be just because kata can afford a cool blacksmith >_>

Hmm...I can only think of a three after quickly looking through the list of champs:

>Katarina
>Shaco
>Rengar

Hope that helps~

While all daggers are knives, the opposite is not true.

Rengar uses Knives.
Katarina uses either Knives or Short Swords, depending on skin.
